  • Method Details

    • close

      protected static void close​(java.sql.Connection conn, java.sql.Statement statement, java.sql.ResultSet resultSet)
      The method responsible for closing the connection to the database.
      Parameters:
      conn - A connection (session) with a specific database
      statement - The object used for executing a static SQL statement and returning the results it produces.
      resultSet - A ResultSet object maintains a cursor pointing to its current row of data. Initially the cursor is positioned before the first row.
